New Records: Glenn Maxwell scored the fastest-ever World Cup century
Adam Zampa became the top wicket-taker at the tournament so far
The winning margin of 309 runs is the largest ever at a Menâ€™s Cricket World Cup and the second largest ever in ODIs
Key Match Events: Glenn Maxwell scored 104 runs off 40 balls
Adam Zampa took 4 wickets for 8 runs
Bas de Leede conceded 115 runs from 10 overs, the most expensive figures in ODI history
Pre-Game Insights: Australia opted to bat first after winning the toss
Travis Head and Marcus Stoinis were omitted from the XI
Netherlands kept the same XI that lost to Sri Lanka
Post-Match Reflections: Glenn Maxwell expressed pride in his team's performance
Scott Edwards will look to pick his players back up after the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain did not interrupt the match
The match was part of the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup 2023
